issue.title: [C++] Simplify ExecPlan's C++ interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In recent work documenting the ExecPlan interface (ARROW-15091) and in trying to make a simple example using it (https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/11799) we are seeing some rough edges.  This parent issue will track a number of subtasks that should make the C++ API easier to work with.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15257?focusedCommentId=17565585) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
